Articles.Content:
The fact that KSP let's me enjoy simple things is one of the main reasons why I enjoy this game so much. Here's something I built a few minutes ago just for fun:

CubeSat I is a very simple rocket+satellite combo meant to be fairly cheap (though I built it in sanbox where it doesn't matter). With ~5000 m/s of dV it can go pretty much anywhere.

Show off your simple things you've built and you are proud of!
I like your designs, i maybe could post some of my compact thing someday!
